rows: Today, the engagement has no legal significance, only a symbolic one.
In order to get married, you must submit an application to the relevant registry office.
Marriage is a contract between a man and a woman that can be concluded informally.
The dissolution of the engagement may have legal consequences.
Couples can only marry if they have been engaged to be married for at least one year.
Anyone who has reached the age of 18 and is capable of judgment is capable of marriage.
The marriage of siblings is also prohibited if the relationship is due to adoption.
A person who is still married but has been separated from their spouse for more than two years may remarry.
Couples are free to choose whether they prefer to get married at the registry office or in church.
If the bridal couple can agree on one person, one best man is sufficient instead of two.
